11:26 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:45 <ClemensR> anyone knows about the status of the pull request for TASKMAN-5 ?  
11:54 <evalica> ClemensR: there is no activity of that PR. Still waiting for someone to review / integrate the changes  
11:55 <ClemensR> ah, ok, I just checked, and I have at most minor issues (some hardwired css colors). Additionally this is a "display only", so you cannot move stuff around, as I first thought  
11:56 <evalica> ClemensR: would be great if you could make the comments on the PR. the problem is that I don't think the contributor will have time to make the changes.  
11:57 <ClemensR> it is likely to be somewhat inefficient if there are many issues, but I guess that is ok-if you have too many issues for the page to load, you might have another problem :)  
11:58 <ClemensR> actually I see no problem with merging this from a technical side, I guess getting rid of the "hard wired" CSS colors would be quite hard (one need to write a separate "status color management page" or add a "color" attribute to the status objects ...  
12:00 <evalica> if you think it's ok - you should merge it. It's a nice functionality to integrate - even if there will be small problems with it  
12:01 <ClemensR> yes I think it is good enough for a merge. as I understand it is ok for you too, then I am going to merge it  
12:01 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <evalica> ClemensR: thanks
